definition: to use/by means of/according to/in order to/because of/at (a certain date or place)
abbr. for Israel 以色列[Yi3 se4 lie4]
to care for other's children as one's own

definition: to honor old people as we do our own aged parents

sentences.english: In the latter period, they were armed with Winchester rifles, clubs and knives.
sentences.chinese: 在后阶段，她们还配备了连发枪以及军棍和军刀。

sentences.english: He is a physically active, super—curious and highly inquisitive boy.
sentences.chinese: 他是一位体力活跃，非常好奇以及很好问的男孩。

sentences.english: The lines can include transformations and other sexiness.
sentences.chinese: 这些线可以包括转换以及其它吸引眼球的东西。

sentences.english: Have Chesapeake and other natural-gas producers survived the worst of the crisis?
sentences.chinese: 切萨皮克以及其他的天然气公司真的挺过来了吗？

sentences.english: This is the color of hopefulness, and of our connection to nature.
sentences.chinese: 这种颜色代表着希望，以及我们和自然的关联。

sentences.english: Also eat some fruits, milk and a small amount of soft drinks containing carbonic acid gas.
sentences.chinese: 还可吃一些水果，牛奶以及少量含碳酸气的饮料。

sentences.english: These traditional disciplines and the use of bamboo weapons remain alive today.
sentences.chinese: 这些传统学科以及竹制武器的使用一直延续至今。

sentences.english: The manufacturing of wood veneers takes great skill as well as experience.
sentences.chinese: 木材的单板生产需要很大的技巧，以及经验。

sentences.english: The number of books, and the rate of reading them, matters not a whit. It’s not a competition.
sentences.chinese: 阅读的数量，以及速率说明不了什么。

sentences.english: Thailand, Malaysia and the Philippines are considering new price controls or subsidies.
sentences.chinese: 泰国，马来西亚以及菲律宾都在考虑价格控制和补贴。

sentences.english: What are the currency pairs and time frames that BURU trades on?
sentences.chinese: BURU交易时间图表以及货币对是什么？

sentences.english: The invention relates to a system and a method for manufacturing flakes of liquid-based cytology.
sentences.chinese: 本发明是关于一种液基细胞学制片系统以及制片方法。

sentences.english: Very well written, the book is packed with clever ideas and fascinating information.
sentences.chinese: 这本书有很好的文笔，聪明的想法以及有趣的信息。

sentences.english: twenty years of age, wore tight mini skirts and low cut blouses. She would
sentences.chinese: 她喜欢穿紧身的低胸t_shirt以及迷你短裙。

sentences.english: POW is still legally bound by the Uniform Code of Military Justice and ethically guided by the Code of Conduct.
sentences.chinese: 战俘依然受军法约束，以及军人守则的道德指导。

definition: to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
to comprise/to include/to involve/to incorporate/to consist of
class/rank/grade/equal to/same as/to wait for/to await/et cetera/and so on/et al. (and other authors)/after/as soon as/once
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
et cetera/and so on .../wait a minute!/hold on!
apart from this/in addition to this
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
